roleset.name: suspending (spatial, non-lehal sense)

example.name: all args
example.text: That's, in fact, a part of the point of his hanging it on the wall.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hang.01. Corresponds to VNcls VNcls put_spatial-9.2-1, spray-9.7-1, poison-42.2, spatial_configuration-47.6, crane-40.3.2, assuming_position-50.

roleset.name: existing, being cool

example.name: both args
example.text: With the brightness of the light shining down on him and their hanging back in the shadows, he could only make out their most basic features.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hang.02. Corresponds to VNcls spatial_configuration-47.6, assuming_position-50.

roleset.name: by the neck, execution

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: John Brown was against his hanging for treason because he believed that he was fighting against an immoral, unjust and extremely inhumane institution ...

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No corresponding VNcls

roleset.name: hanging_up

roles.note: verb frame's arg1 contained 2 separate arguments that could co-occur, so I've broken them up here.

example.name: all args
example.text: I asked him some basic questions about the economy that he couldn't answer, which resulted in his hanging up the phone on me.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hang.03. No VNcls.

roleset.name: waiting

example.name: both args
example.text: He does not have to justify himself; his presidency for life, which is the real meaning of his hanging on for a third term...

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hang.04. No VNcls.

roleset.name: maintaining possession of

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: he finally comes to realise that maybe his views and his hanging on to the past need revision after all.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on hang.05
